info.author: Jp Calderone
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Pynfo is a combination IRC info, search, and network relay bot. It supports
basic fact definition (with persistence between runs) and searching of Google
and dict.org. In the network relay mode it "bridges" channels on different
networks by passing messages between them. It also has a plugin interface,
allowing users to easily define new commands.
info.name: pynfo
info.html_description: Pynfo is a combination IRC info, search, and network relay bot. It supports basic fact definition (with persistence between runs) and searching of Google and dict.org. In the network relay mode it “bridges” channels on different networks by passing messages between them. It also has a plugin interface, allowing users to easily define new commands.
